name: Midvinter
description: Midvinter is a cozy little point-and-click game, which invites you to explore Swedish folklore using puzzles and riddles as well as compelling music and voice over. In it, you as a player take on the role of gnome - the guardian of the farm - and get to interact with various dark and fantastical creatures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU     T6400  @ 2.00GHz (2 CPUs), ~2.0GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 4650 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Incredible game, definitely recommend for people that just want a nice chilled out session of game time and enjoys learning about folklore. Will have to play it a few more times to get the rest of the endings. So worth the small amount of money!

if you love this game u can love any game. i finished it in 30 minutes and i literally did nothing. i said to the troll to stop and he said that i was right and it was the and of the game. seriously what the ♥♥♥♥?
